players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie's death is suspicious and we should discuss who could have been responsible."
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night. We need to vote her out to protect the town."
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. We must vote her out now before she kills again."
